branchCategory.name: MHK
branchCategory.description: <P>The series MHK2 grippers utilize a wedge cam design to minimize their overall size, allow no lateral vibration along stroke direction once the workpiece is held, while retaining a high holding force. Available in single acting (N.C., N.O.) and double acting as well as with a long stroke option.</P>

branchItem.name: MHK, Air Gripper, Wedge Cam Operated Slide Guide
branchItem.description: <P>The series MHK2 grippers utilize a wedge cam design to minimize their overall size, allow no lateral vibration along stroke direction once the workpiece is held, while retaining a high holding force. Available in single acting (N.C., N.O.) and double acting as well as with a long stroke option.</P>
